Intro: Welcome to Aviation API. This application is currently under development. Please see below for available test routes.

POST.info: Generates a new API key and sends the new key to the email included with the request. For testing, the rate limit is set to 10 requests per 15 minutes.

errors.400: Email is not present or email is invalid.

GET.info: Currently shows Lufthansa and other Star Alliance flights

errors.400: API key is missing or api_key is misspelled.
errors.401: The API key sent is invalid.
errors.429: You have exceeded the rate limit.

Error format: { status: 4XX, error: 'General error name', message: 'Descriptive error message' }
